tha-ap95:4.3: Paramakāpaññapattomhi → paramakāruññapattomhi (si, s2, s3, mr) | parakāpaññapattomhi (pts1)
tha-ap95:7.1: Ekūnapaññāsakappamhi → ekūnapaṇṇekappamhi (bj) | ekapaññāsakappamhi (s2, s3) | ekūnapaṇṇe kappamhi (pts1)
tha-ap95:7.4: bāttiṃsāsuṃ → battiṃsāsuṃ (bj) | khattiyāsuṃ (s2, s3, mr) | battiṃsāsu (pts1)
